attributes.action: Against the proposal that Aylestone Library, Leicester be relocated to Aylestone Leisure Centre
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is opposing the proposed move of Aylestone library
Richmond Road,
Leicester,
LE2 8BB

to

Aylestone Leisure Centre,
2 Knighton Lane East,
Leicester,  LE2 6LU.

Aylestone library is a small, listed building which provides a fantastic facility for Aylestone residents. The proposal is to move the library and make a self-service room at Aylestone leisure centre.  The sports centre is a large, noisy building which has no atmosphere. A librarian and assistants will either face redundancy or have to move to another job within the council.

rejection.details: Local library services are a matter for the local authority.
